/* Displays the home page, is called within the topnav in SideBar Is loaded upon connection Used to display notifications and the graph predictions @Notes: Lyka Marcelino, 04/04/2020 */ import React from 'react'; import {Row, Col} from "react-bootstrap"; import StaticGraph from "../components/graphDisplays/StaticGraph"; import StaticGraph2 from "../components/graphDisplays/StaticGraph2"; const roundblock = { backgroundColor: "whitesmoke", borderRadius: "50px", display: "block", width: "1300px", height: "450px", marginLeft: "90px", marginTop: "24px", } const notifications ={ backgroundColor: "whitesmoke", borderRadius: "50px", display: "block", width: "6010px", height: "200px", textAlign: "left", marginLeft: "0px", marginTop: "24px", alignContent: "left" } export const Home = (props) => ( <>
User Dashboard
Notifications
Inventory Warning: There is not enough concrete to complete project sales on items.

Current inventory of item #06879 will last until next week.

Sales for item #08096 are projected to sell at a higher rate than expected!
)
